<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Contains the information about the kind of vectorization</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// available.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This object in independent on the paradigm used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// represent vector functions. in particular, it is not attached to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// any target-specific ABI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfshape"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfshape">VFShape</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfshape/#a77688fcf1805363e5914276b0d491b63"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/elementcount">ElementCount</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfshape/#a77688fcf1805363e5914276b0d491b63">VF</a>;                        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Vectorization factor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfshape/#a82591e3e596fe99aebc1e2f3316ef41c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;VFParameter, 8&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfshape/#a82591e3e596fe99aebc1e2f3316ef41c">Parameters</a>; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// List of parameter information.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo/#ad9bb08bdbfc73cf77e85c835840baf10"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfshape">VFShape</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo/#ad9bb08bdbfc73cf77e85c835840baf10">Shape</a>;          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Classification of the vector function.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo/#aa8ab6db11ae7c0891185e2a2a1f338d5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abe2c24a8dc2fb979e8e54e15f088169c">VFISAKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo/#aa8ab6db11ae7c0891185e2a2a1f338d5">ISA</a>;          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Instruction Set Architecture.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the index of the first parameter with the kind &#39;GlobalPredicate&#39;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// if any exist.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo/#a9b430434548d148d4fcab54003f5f57b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo/#a9b430434548d148d4fcab54003f5f57b">getParamIndexForOptionalMask</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ParamCount = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo/#ad9bb08bdbfc73cf77e85c835840baf10">Shape</a>.Parameters.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; ParamCount; ++i)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if at least one of the operands to the vectorized function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// has the kind &#39;GlobalPredicate&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo/#a7a7b7f899842cba56b84e670f7d48700"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo/#a7a7b7f899842cba56b84e670f7d48700">isMasked</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo/#a9b430434548d148d4fcab54003f5f57b">getParamIndexForOptionalMask</a>().has&#95;value(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi">VFABI</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// LLVM Internal VFABI ISA token for vector functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#af33ac7943ba16e891cd1b6e307029301"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#af33ac7943ba16e891cd1b6e307029301">&#95;LLVM&#95;</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#95;LLVM&#95;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Prefix for internal name redirection for vector function that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tells the compiler to scalarize the call using the scalar name</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of the function. For example, a mangled name like</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#95;ZGV&#95;LLVM&#95;N2v&#95;foo(&#95;LLVM&#95;Scalarize&#95;foo)&#96; would tell the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vectorizer to vectorize the scalar call &#96;foo&#96;, and to scalarize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it once vectorization is done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a3b4aafd885099e61903f0a29e638a8b1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a3b4aafd885099e61903f0a29e638a8b1">&#95;LLVM&#95;Scalarize&#95;</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#95;LLVM&#95;Scalarize&#95;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Function to construct a VFInfo out of a mangled names in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// following format:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &lt;VFABI&#95;name&gt;&#123;(&lt;redirection&gt;)&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// where &lt;VFABI&#95;name&gt; is the name of the vector function, mangled according</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to the rules described in the Vector Function ABI of the target vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// extension (or &lt;isa&gt; from now on). The &lt;VFABI&#95;name&gt; is in the following</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// format:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#95;ZGV&lt;isa&gt;&lt;mask&gt;&lt;vlen&gt;&lt;parameters&gt;&#95;&lt;scalarname&gt;&#91;(&lt;redirection&gt;)&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This methods support demangling rules for the following &lt;isa&gt;:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; AArch64: https://developer.arm.com/docs/101129/latest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; x86 (libmvec): https://sourceware.org/glibc/wiki/libmvec and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  https://sourceware.org/glibc/wiki/libmvec?action=AttachFile&amp;do=view&amp;target=VectorABI.txt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param MangledName -&gt; input string in the format</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#95;ZGV&lt;isa&gt;&lt;mask&gt;&lt;vlen&gt;&lt;parameters&gt;&#95;&lt;scalarname&gt;&#91;(&lt;redirection&gt;)&#93;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param FTy -&gt; FunctionType of the scalar function which we&#39;re trying to find</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a vectorized variant for. This is required to determine the vectorization</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// factor for scalable vectors, since the mangled name doesn&#39;t encode that;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it needs to be derived from the widest element types of vector arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// or return values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;VFInfo&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a46c9ccb087f925d00317f16577410a13">tryDemangleForVFABI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> MangledName,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype">FunctionType</a> &#42;FTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Retrieve the &#96;VFParamKind&#96; from a string token.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#add480f2ed87faa59c16d4c01ffb4bf39">VFParamKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#aaf19acac548dca3c8f263ceb6a860b57">getVFParamKindFromString</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Token);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Name of the attribute where the variant mappings are stored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a11875601ee512fa1f5cf6b6354c8def9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a11875601ee512fa1f5cf6b6354c8def9">MappingsAttrName</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;vector-function-abi-variant&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Populates a set of strings representing the Vector Function ABI variants</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// associated to the CallInst CI. If the CI does not contain the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// vector-function-abi-variant attribute, we return without populating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// VariantMappings, i.e. callers of getVectorVariantNames need not check for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the presence of the attribute (see InjectTLIMappings).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a8adf44ad04562ff150b0e8e352a38d46">getVectorVariantNames</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &amp;CI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;std::string&gt;</a> &amp;VariantMappings);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Constructs a FunctionType by applying vector function information to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// type of a matching scalar function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param Info gets the vectorization factor (VF) and the VFParamKind of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// parameters.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param ScalarFTy gets the Type information of parameters, as it is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// stored in \\p Info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\returns a pointer to a newly created vector FunctionType</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype">FunctionType</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a7ae16889db439f8fbb234fe3de672d11">createFunctionType</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo">VFInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype">FunctionType</a> &#42;ScalarFTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Overwrite the Vector Function ABI variants attribute with the names provide</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in \\p VariantMappings.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a9ad2ee389fa99a4c02f610183530735c">setVectorVariantNames</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;CI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;std::string&gt;</a> VariantMappings);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace VFABI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"></CodeLine>
